page.title: 03Lower Park Farm - Lathom
page.content: Today the main crops they grow are cabbages,potatoes,leeks,lettuce, and barley. They send their crops to merchants who send them to packhouses and then to supermarkets. All the supermarkets want small cabbages so that people buy 2 small cabbages instead of 1 big cabbage. So,they have to grow all their cabbages the same size. {Future Farming} We asked the farmer's son what farming would be like in the future. He would still grow the same crops because he knows the crops grow well in Lathom soil and there is always a good market for vegetables. Hovercrafts are going to be used in the future on the farm and are already used in the U.S.A. He thought Robots will also be used more in the future. They are already used for planting cabbages.
